features: ABSORBENT & LINT FREE & SCRATCH FREE - These non-abrasive cleaning rags can soak up water from the countertop and tables instantly and without lint or streaks left behind. Clean with or without water, from worktops, appliances to kitchens, bathrooms, mirrors etc, they will make your house sparkling.

MULTI-PURPOSE CLEANING RAGS - These premium microfiber towels are perfect dish rags which don't smell, removes grease and particles from microwave oven, plates, pots or pans effortlessly. Not only that, you will be amazed they are also terrific duster that removes fingertips from silverware and glasses easily and leaves your kitchen spotless.

BULK PACK & SAVE MONEY - Comes with 5 colors and 10 cleaning towels each with a total pack of 50 pcs allow you to use for a decent amount of time. You don't have to feel bad even you change your cleaning cloths frequently.

REUSABLE & LONG LASTING - These microfiber towels feature high quality stitching with reinforced edges, they are durable and made to last hundreds of washings. They are lightweight, super absorbent and dry quickly, use them everyday to enjoy your cleaning.

MR.SIGA's mission: Make your housework easier, and make the world cleaner. Should you have any questions about the product or after-sale service, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here for support and advice!
description: Product Description CARE INSTRUCTIONS: -Machine wash or hand wash microfiber cloths separately in warm water and mild detergent. -Do not use bleach or fabric softener. -Do not tumble dry. -Do not iron. -Always keep dry after use SCRATCH-FREE The soft, non-abrasive cleaning cloth will not scratch items, nor will it scrape paint, coatings or other surfaces. It can capture tiny dust and particles without leaving streaks, allowing you to find the fun of doing housework! HIGH-PREFORMANCE CLEANING ASSISTANT These microfiber cleaning cloths can perfectly meet any of your cleaning needs. High-quality sewing, not easy to tear, durable, whether it is to wipe the kitchen counter, bathroom bathtub, furniture cleaning, or car cleaning, as your home cleaning assistant, these cleaning cloths will not let you down. LONG LASTING These microfiber towels feature high quality stitching with reinforced edges, they are durable and made to last hundreds of washings. They are lightweight, super absorbent and dry quickly, use them everyday to enjoy your cleaning. TACKLE VERSATILE CLEANING JOBS You can choose the color of the microfiber cloth according to the place to be cleaned and the type of dirt to specify their different specific uses, use them as kitchen towels, bathroom towels, floor mops, car towels, window/mirror cloths and other household cleaning tasks.
